items.title: Shopify full-stack developer - Upwork
items.content:encoded:
Full Stack Developer duties and responsibilities:
-Managing the complete software development process from conception to deployment
-Maintaining and upgrading the software following deployment
-Managing the end-to-end life cycle for the production of software and applications
-Overseeing and guiding the analyzing, writing, building, and deployment of software
-Overseeing the automated testing and providing feedback to management during the development process
-Modifying and testing changes to previously developed programs
Full Stack Developer skills and qualifications:
Front-end technology: Expertise in front-end technologies, including JavaScript, CSS3 and HTML5 and third-party libraries such as React Js, Angular, jQuery and LESS.
Development languages: Knowledge of server-side programming languages including Net, Java, Ruby and Python.
Database and cache: Familiarity with DBMS technology, including SQLServer, Oracle, MongoDB and MySQL and caching mechanisms such as Redis, Memcached and Varnish.
Basic design ability: Including knowledge of UI/UX and basic prototype design.
Server: Experience working with Nginx or Apache servers with a solid background in Linux.
-Excellent writing and communication skills that is fluent in english to speak, read, write, and under the language
-Should have industry certifications in various web design and programming languages, such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, C#, Python and similar certifications.
-Ability to visualize a proposed system and be able to build it

Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00

items.title: Create online Drive like Google Drive or Drop Box, in NodeJS (Proof of Concept only) - Upwork
items.content:encoded:
This is just to create a proof of concept online drive (consumer file storage system). If successful, this will lead to a larger project to make it scalable and robust.

I'd like to add file storage capability to my messaging platform, based on Amazon S3. This is something like Google Drive, Drop Box, etc. We use react framework with NodeJS.

For good reasons that you specify, I  can consider using other languages for implementation of backend (such as kotlin). However, I'd prefer everything to be written in NodeJS (frontend and backend). Frontend must be in NodeJS within React framework.

Must support:
- Any modern web browser (will test in Google Chrome and Safari)
- Backend storage is either Amazon S3 and MongoDB hosted in AWS (I am open to your alternative suggestions)
- File sizes at least 250MB in size, ideally the limit would be 1TB like in Google Drive or 5TB as allowed by Amazon S3.
- List view, thumbnail views, detail views
- "Collections" (Collections are just lists of content that is stored in other folder locations, like an organizable list of symbolic links)
- Complex sharing access (read only, vs edit/write access) that can be shared among groups of users
- Search
- Filters (by type of document, date range for last modified or uploaded, by user's name and by sharing access)
- Drag and drop functionality to reorganize (move between folders),
- Copy or cut and paste files (to different locations)
- Able to upload/download files directly from/to my computer and phone
- Drag desktop files and/or folders onto the online drive window in order to upload
- Shortcuts (thumbnails for urls for files located outside the online drive)
- Encryption when stored when this option is activated by the members (so that even our own developers and sys admins can't read files uploaded by our members. Of course we'll encrypt all uploads).

Budget: $500
Posted On: March 02, 2021 00:18 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:JavaScript, Node.js, MongoDB, React, Amazon Web Services, Amazon S3
Country: United States
click to apply

items.title: Full stack iOS developer needed for kids app (Swift) - Upwork
items.content:encoded:
About us:
Our company is thriving to make a very well put E-learning app for kids and parents (iPhone &iPad). We have a clear idea of how the project should look like and we need a skilled developer to make it happen.  

What we're looking for:
A Full Stack experienced iOS developer who has worked with "Swift" and Reactjs, Nodejs or Angular for the back-end . We need someone to work on specific project requirements, including building the front-end and the back-end, services, API integration, and basically translating our needs into a functional application. We have two apps as references: We want something similar to "Papumba" kids home page and Back-end, "Lingokids" Parents side. Please take a moment and look at those specified sections in the apps. We will provide the content. The design (detailed instructions will be provided) and the backgrounds(provided) will be very simple. We will provide most of the pieces for the front-end design ( We do not have a prototype).

This project requires experience with:
1- Experience with Swift
2 - Experience with Reactjs, Nodejs or Angular (building admin panels, adding content tool, tracking progress tool...etc) for building multiple API integrations.
3- Experience with unity (is a plus but not required ) and unity integration (Gaming engine integration) required.
4- Experience with Apple's design principles and interface guidelines
5- Experienced or willing to learn about Apple's regulation for kids apps.
6- Solid graphic and responsive skills.
7- Strong communication skills is required
8- Experience with E-learning and kids apps is a plus but not required.
9 - Experience with simple and minimalist design is also a plus but not required.
10- Experienced with Lottie json, animation and modern design is a plus but not required.
11-  Experienced with Google firebase or AWS.

Our budget is $500 to $1000 depending on your expertise (open for negotiation within that ballpark). We will be providing a bonus if the final product is delivered on time.

Please make sure you check all of our ‘must’ requirements list before applying.
Our ‘must’ requirement:
-above average to great English language skills .
-Very strong communication skills( honesty, updates...etc.)
-ready to sign a NDA and IP agreement..
-respects work timeline (completion needed to be done within 15-20days or less)

What to send:
-A brief convincing paragraph about what makes you the best fit for this project.
-Please state all the skills that you are NOT experienced with by using the numbers associated with it(from above).
-Please include 2-6 relevant portfolio pieces that show your best work and creativity (preferably but not limited to E-learning, simple, minimalist and kids friendly design, a recent iOS project, ideally one currently available on the App Store.).
-Please answer our screening questions.

Please don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions.

We would continue using your services and get your help (maintenance, enhancement ..etc.) if we have experienced a great result.

Hope to hear from you.

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: March 02, 2021 00:04 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:API, API Integration, UX/UI, Database Development, Responsive Design, CRM, Database Design, Angular, AngularJS, CreateJS, Node.js, Very Small (1-9 employees), React

items.title: Swift developer needed for initial project + ongoing work - Upwork
items.content:encoded:
Chamber DS is expanding our team and looking for an experienced remote, contract-based Swift developer. React Native experience is a huge plus.

This position is designed to be ongoing, with an initial scope (defined below) to assess your experience, expertise and cultural fit with our team. We will use this initial scope to qualify you based on your performance.


### About us:
- We are an app incubator for some amazing startups
- We have exciting projects to work on from various industries
- We have a clearly established process for working with contractors that you will find to be very comfortable and refreshing
- We take care of our team, and will handle the majority of requirements gathering for you
- Our Agile-based system makes it easy for everyone to stay on track

### Must haves:
- You speak excellent English, and can communicate remotely flawlessly (no connectivity issues)
- You are skilled with native iOS development
- Experience with React Native is a huge plus!
- You have experience with RESTful APIs
- You have experience extending existing code bases and building from scratch, following best practices
- You have experience with mobile CI/CD deployment processes
- You keep up with industry best practices and deliver code that is understandable and maintainable

### This Project - High level
The InnerPro athlete app is our flagship project. It is an iOS app written in Swift built using a MVVM/Coordinator model. The app interfaces with our webserver using a standard REST API in JSON format. There is another communication system in the app that leverages Pusher Channels to receive websocket messages from the server. Right now the only thing the websocket system is used for is to receive a message and display it as an alert. It is only used for one use case currently.

InnerPro is an athlete training system which focuses on the entire player’s development: physical, mental and nutritional. It contains a workout system, screens designed for meditation, a full video training course, basic reporting, and a basic nutritional plan.

### This Project - Initial Scope
The goal is to be smart with our development so that we can deliver features in the short term in such a way that we enable additional functionality in the long run without incurring additional development cost. Evolve the existing system to optimize the long-term evolution path while also delivering on short term needs.

The long-term goals are to be able to leverage the websockets system to deliver whatever messages we want to whichever users we want, and to be able to ask whatever survey questions we want to whichever users we want, and get the results back. We want a system that is robust, reliable, scalable, and maintainable.

The short-term goal and the requirements of this project is the following user story:

User Story 1: As an athlete, I should be required to fill out a survey each day before being able to use the InnerPro app
- This is a full page screen that will effectively lock out the user until they answer the questions of the survey
- The details of the screen will be sent out once per day using the new messaging system. This will “queue up” for each user. The queue should be “checked” upon login. Again, the intention is for this to be used as a general purpose messaging system, only in this case it is able to contain a survey in its payload.
- Displayed upon login, or once daily (using the new messaging system)
- The message should never be displayed to a user who is in the following "do not disturb" states
----- In a workout
----- Watching a Personal Evolution Training video
----- On the Create Your Game Morning or Evening routine screens
----- On the Generate State screen
- The survey for each day is considered a separate instance. Once the user submits a response to an instance of a survey, there is no need to display that instance again (because of concurrency issues there will be a need to keep track of the survey ID mobile side)
----- Keep in mind it is possible to display multiple surveys in the same session
- The user should not be able to circumvent the survey by logging in to multiple devices or by any other means
----- After filling out the survey on one device, there is no need to update the other device. It is acceptable that the user fill out the survey twice or restart the app in order to get past the lockout screen
- Again, a reminder… the intention is to build a robust messaging system to be used as the backbone for future functionality.

NOTE: The Proposal Bid should be accurate. We anticipate in order to provide an accurate bid, you will need access to the source code repo. Please message and we will provide an NDA for your signature and will provide repo access.

Hourly Range: $30.00-$60.00
Posted On: February 20, 2021 00:46 UTC
Category: Mobile App Development
Skills:React Native, iOS, Native, Swift
Country: United States
click to apply

items.title: React Native: Build screens based on existing Figma mockups - Upwork
items.content:encoded:
We need an experienced React Native developer to build screens based on our existing Figma mockups.

In this first phase, we only need the screens with a basic linear navigation sequence.

No logic, no state management, no backend access.
Just pure layout.

Before you apply, please make sure you can:
- Showcase some apps you have worked on in the past
- Go through their source code and explain how you built the visual components and screens

If shortlisted, we will have a call to show the first batch of screens and get an estimate of the effort (hours) required to complete this first batch of screens.

The total number of screens can be as high as 60 (divided into several batches representing the different sections of the app).

items.title: Rectify This Act Of Gross Wickedness and Unfairness - Upwork
items.content:encoded:
Hi Alex,
Can you and your mates at bearwm.com update the information on your website b2bhint.com and remove my details? The information about me on b2bhint.com is sourced from an old and archaic version of Companies House UK Public Register. However Companies House UK have investigated my matter and concluded that the information is false and should be removed , because that information was submitted under false pretences by a questionable Pastor.

I have never been a Director nor a Care Worker in my life.

Companies House UK have long ago proceeded to amend their records, deleted this false information from the Public Register of Companies, and deleted it from their website also.

b2bhint.com is the only website which continues to show this false information online - all other privately owned online directories have amended and updated their feeds to reflect this change, i.e. a total of ten other directories have all responded and deleted this false information from their websites.

You, Maxim Stepanov, and Valeriu Șhulghin can act as responsible adults and remove this false information (screenshots attached) which is affecting my life in diverse ways and causing me a great deal of distress.

items.title: Add member area + Stripe Subscribtion to existing Chrome extension - Upwork
items.content:encoded:
Hello,

We are looking for someone that can implement a basic member area + membership for our chrome extension boirlerplate.

The front-end is ready to use and includes the following views/pages:
- Login form
- Registration form
- Profile page
- Plan / Subscription page

You'll only need to add 2 additionnal views:
- Password recovery form
- Card details / Payment form

Stripe will be used as the payment processor. In addition to that, 2 plans (monthly + yearly) will be created when the server starts if they are not found / don't exist on Stripe.


Your job is to develop the backend and connect everything together, basically a  NodeJS / Express server with all required endpoints:

- Create  and delete user account + email confirmation (nothing fancy here, emails can be a plain text sentence)
- Change / recover password
- Subscribe to a plan
- Cancel a subscription
- Switch plan: billing needs to be re-adjusted (when it's required) when a subscribed user change from monthly to yearly or from yearly to monghly subscription.

You will also create 2 pages to check users permissions. The first page should only be visible to authenticated users. The other one, only to subscribed (paid) users. For the database, you will use MySQL or PostgreSQL.

All configurations ( API keys, database connection etc...)  should be handled thanks to the .env file. We consider this as a pretty straightforward task most developers have already worked on. That's why proposals over 1 week delivery won't even be answered.

The deliverable will be a .zip archive of a working extension.

Please apply only if you are familiar With React + Chrome Extension + Stripe API and available to start.

Budget: $150
Posted On: March 01, 2021 22:55 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:API, JavaScript, Node.js, React, API Integration, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Chrome Extension
Country: France
click to apply

items.title: Full Stack React Developer - Upwork
items.content:encoded:
We are a hotel analytics company that helps hotels monitor their performance in real time using our web and mobile app dashboards.

We are now working with larger scale clients and are looking for a React Developer to help us developer and tailor the system for these larger clients of which we have a waiting list.

You will work closely with our business team to take the existing system and rebuild screens so they work as these large scale clients desire. You will also help us automate some of our maintenance functions.

This will be a long term project that we would like to run for a year or longer and will offer performance based incentives. You will have daily access to the business team and the clients to ensure the directions of what we want to do are clear.

We need someone who has experience with building charting systems in React, experience with Microsoft Azure and connecting with new APIs.

At Archer Perry, we are modernizing the way you build your dream home. We are working with top professionals in the Ottawa and Toronto area while currently looking to expand. Archer Perry was conceptualized in 2020 during the life-changing global pandemic. We're currently still in the early stages but getting closer to launching.

YOUR ROLE:
As our Tech Lead, you will bring a specialized knowledge in each stage of software development including mobile development, server operations, front-end and back-end development, and design. You will help us onboard more specialized developers as needed. You have a creative eye and with help provide high quality technology solutions as per business needs. Ultimately, you should be able to create a functional and attractive digital environment for our company, ensuring great user experience.


Experience with and not limited to:
LAMP, MEAN, ROR, ASP.NET
JAVASCRIPT, HTML, REDUX
BOOTSTRAP, STRUTS
RabbitMQ, SQS
MongoDB
Relational databases (Postgres, SQL, mySQL)
Cloud platform expertise
Docker
Some test framework (jest, mocha)
Previous experience in building eCommerce companies
Who you are:
5+ years working as a tech lead
Proven work experience as a front-end developer
Understanding of layout aesthetics
Knowledge of SEO principles
In-depth understanding of the entire web development process (design, development and deployment)
Developing and creating solutions on the fly
Strong communication skills
Exceptional organizational and time management skills
You take pride in the quality of the delivered software products and services

With your skillset, we look to continue growing, improving and essentially changing the process as we know it. As we continue to spread the word about Archer Perry, we are more excited everyday to launch our product with hopes of you being onboard.

Hourly Range: $25.00-$40.00
Posted On: March 01, 2021 22:05 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:Website Development, API Integration, JavaScript, CSS, React, HTML, Java, Web Application, Print Design, Database Architecture
Country: Canada

items.title: Magento 2.4 Venia Theme - Upwork
items.content:encoded:
We’re a small business looking to implement new websites/brands on Magento. We already have a NEW Magento 2.4 installed on Cloudways. We’re looking to have a theme/template designed based on PWA theme Venia, with install instructions. Each domain will be hosted on their own server and connected to the one Magento backend. We’re open to recommendations. We plan on using it with our Magento Multi-site install for multiple brands and would like a starter theme we can work with to easily start a new brand when we want.
Our requirements are as follows (please price individually as we may not do it all at once, we’re on a budget):
• PWA Venia stock template with install instructions to connect to our server
• Recurring/Subscription integrated through Graphql to our theme (backend plug hasn’t been finalized and we’re open to recommendations)
• Blog integrated with react or react/next.js open to CMS integrations but leaning towards Storyblok or Prismic
• Email marketing checkbox on Checkout(currently using Klavyio BUT plan on switching soon
*Please note we’re looking for someone that we can work with for regular projects to grow and keep up with our site.

Budget: $10
Posted On: March 01, 2021 21:59 UTC
Category: Ecommerce Development
Skills:React, Braintree, Authorize.Net, Stripe, Very Small (1-9 employees), Magento
Country: United States
click to apply

items.title: React/Redux/Python/Django/AWS Dev: Websocket Handshake Error 502 - Upwork
items.content:encoded:
Looking for a React/Redux/Python/Django/AWS websocket specialist to debug a problem with chat messages disappearing and not refreshing correctly.

On Elastic Beanstalk the production python/django backend is in a "Severe" status, and the supervisor appears to be in an exit/start loop.


WebSocket connection to '________' failed: Error during WebSocket handshake: Unexpected response code: 502

Please respond with your experience dealing with Elastic Beanstalk/Python/ websocket/handshake bugs and react/redux.

Thank you!

Hourly Range: $25.00-$45.00
